entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Inukjuak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:45 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -32.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Inukjuak Airport 03:00 AM EST Sunday 08 January 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -32.1°C
Pressure: 101.8 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -46
Dewpoint: -35.4°C
Wind: ENE 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 53 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 32.
